attributes.additional_details: As a current Year 11 taking my GCSE's it can often be hard to work in a class of 'mixed ability' and I believe that everyone would benefit from a system of this sort to to be brought back, maybe not in its previous form but maybe in a new reformed form, maybe, with a exam taken in Year 9 to establish who is taught what. This could be taught within the same school within different departments.
